reviews.text:
Worth braving the craziness of campus for a sub! 

This was my first visit so I went with the popular #1 Original, served hot (their version of an Italian)....
I've ordered here a couple times now - once on Grubhub and now once in person - and I personally think it's a unique experience but not quite worth ordering...
Dave's cosmos subs started in Chagrin Falls, a suburb of Cleveland. Now it's a franchise and has locations all over Ohio but also some unexpected states...
